oai_dc:dc.dc:title: VERIFICATION AND PRACTICAL USE OF BLOCK REVETMENT DESIGN METHOD
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Burger, A.M.
Bezuijen, A.
Pilarczyk, K.W.
Breteler, M. Klein
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: revetment
block revetment
revetment design
design method verification
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The research into the physical processes in concrete block revetments under wave attack resulted in three separate design methods. A resume is given of the numerical, analytical and black-box methods and their respective fields of application have been indicated. Special attention is given to the verification of the analytical model with large scale model tests.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
